system.description:
A stoppered flask which, upon speaking the proper command word, pours forth fresh or salt water at three different rates of flow.

  • Stream: A trickle of 1 gallon (8 pints) per round.

  • Fountain: A 5’ high fountain of 5 gallons per round.

  • Geyser: A 20’ long jet of 30 gallons per round. Anyone holding the decanter must make a STR check each round or be knocked down by the force of the geyser.

  • Attacking: The geyser can be used as a missile attack (20’ range), inflicting [[/r 1d2]] damage per hit.

  • Filling spaces: The geyser will fill a 10’ cubic space every 4 turns.

  • Stopping the flow: A command word stops the water flowing, allowing the stopper to be put back in.
